AI/ML.name: Dr. Maria Lopez
AI/ML.title: Associate Professor
AI/ML.bio: AI researcher specializing in attention mechanisms and transformer architectures. Published seminal work on efficient transformers. Open to commercialization partnerships.

Healthcare.name: Dr. John Smith
Healthcare.title: Principal Research Scientist
Healthcare.bio: Computational biologist focused on AI-driven drug discovery. Previously developed novel methods for protein folding prediction. Active in industry collaborations.

Climate Tech.name: Dr. Emily Zhang
Climate Tech.title: Assistant Professor
Climate Tech.bio: Climate scientist developing novel carbon capture materials. Interested in translating research to commercial applications. Co-founded 1 climate tech startup.

Semiconductors.name: Dr. David Park
Semiconductors.title: Senior Researcher
Semiconductors.bio: Semiconductor researcher with focus on advanced lithography techniques. Led development of 3nm process innovations. Available for IP licensing discussions.

Biotech.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
Biotech.title: Professor of Genetics
Biotech.bio: Geneticist pioneering CRISPR-based therapeutics. Founded 2 biotech companies. Strong track record of successful tech transfer.

Energy.name: Dr. Ahmed Hassan
Energy.title: Associate Professor
Energy.bio: Energy systems researcher focused on next-gen battery technologies. Holds 12 patents in solid-state batteries. Open to licensing partnerships.

Materials.name: Dr. Lisa Chen
Materials.title: Principal Research Scientist
Materials.bio: Materials scientist developing novel 2D materials for electronics and energy applications. Active in industry consulting. Advisory board member at 3 startups.

Robotics.name: Dr. Tomas Rodriguez
Robotics.title: Associate Professor
Robotics.bio: Robotics researcher specializing in autonomous manipulation and learning. Co-founded autonomous warehouse robotics company. Looking for next commercialization opportunity.

Fintech.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
Fintech.title: Assistant Professor
Fintech.bio: Economist and cryptographer researching decentralized finance systems. Published influential work on blockchain scalability. Advisory role at 2 crypto companies.

Consumer.name: Dr. Marcus Lee
Consumer.title: Associate Professor of Marketing
Consumer.bio: Marketing researcher focused on AI-driven personalization. Consulted for Fortune 500 companies on recommendation algorithms. Published 3 books on consumer psychology.
